name: First-Time-Mindustry-Mod
author: AQUA
description:
[white]add cheap, odd and overpowered blocks 
- [pink]just for fun. CHECKED everything works normally! Color CHANGED!
- [pink]updated 03-July-2020!

+ [white]After [green]AQUA drill [white]has been researched, all the other blocks will be unlocked one after the others

+ [green]AQUA drill, AQUA conduit, AQUA conveyor[white]- extremely high speed blocks

+ [green]AQUA cryo extractor[white]- extracts cryo fluid from the void

+ [pink] Added [green]AQUA water extractor[white]- extracts water fluid from the ground

+ [pink] Added [green]AQUA oil extractor [white]: extract a huge amount of oit from the ground

+ [green]AQUA force projector , AQUA overdrive projector, AQUA mender[white]- huge range, durable and high speed

+++ [red] FIXED, CHANGED [green] AQUA force projector. its cooldown time is reduced from over 3m to 16-17s. With cryo fluid, it is 6-7s cd after it breaks reaching its limit.

+ [green]AQUA sand sifters[white]: blast compound, phase fabric, surge alloy, thorium

+ [green]AQUA solar pannel[white]: provide a huge amount of energy , still limited

+ [white] Added [green]AQUA oil shifting machines [white]: turns oil into essential ores

+++ [red] FIXED, CHANGED [green] AQUA oil shifting machine - Divide the machine into 5 smaller 1x1 machines

+ [white] Added [green]AQUA big distributor [white]: distribute items fast

+ [green]AQUA powernode [white]: small but huge laser range

[white]If you want to join THC INVENTORS,send an email to 2356747603@qq.com or tell us on discord.

[yellow]v2.2

-Предметы: торитиум
-Исправлены вылеты
-Изменено внутреннее имя
[yellow]v2.1
[cyan]-Исправлены текстуры
-Пофикшены некоторые баги
-Удален песочный фильтр из-за вылетов
-Изменено название мода
-Теперь мод на GitHub'е
[yellow]v2.0
[cyan]-Исправлены название и описание ториевой плавильни
-Изменен способ получения тория
-Блоки: Дробитель меди/титана, торитовая плавильня

name: mindustry-mod-test-by-abomb4
author: 滞人
description:
这是一个实验性 mod，用 js 写点奇怪的功能。
This is an experimental mod, implements some funny function using js.

已实现：光棱塔、冷冻力场、燃烧力场、无限跳波方块、额外核心、三大作弊方块、心灵控制、熔毁大风车、激光机甲、量子发射台、虚空力场（过于玩赖）、时空传送桥、护盾机甲

Already implemented:
Prism Tower, Cold Shield, Burn Projector, Unlimited Next Wave, Another Core, Cheat Blocks, Mind Control, Meltdown Fan, Chrono Mass Driver, Chrono Vault, Chrono Unloader, Laser Mech, Quantum Launchpad, Void Force (VERY CHEAT), Chrono Bridge, Shielded Mech

0.16.0：Lancer 机甲改名 Tancer 机甲，有治愈效果，削弱攻击力

name: mintd
author: 滞人
description:
传统塔防！在附带的塔防地图中，敌人不会攻击核心以外的目标，并且行动路线不允许造任何方块。
敌人还会随着波数的增加而变的更结实。

Traditional tower defence mode! In a tower defence map, enemys won't attack any target expect your core, and we cannot build any block on enemy road.
Enemys will be stronger with the wave number increments.

0.1.3: Adjust speed, fast unit slower, others faster.
